titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the exception to the treatment of consolidated groups under the personal holding company rules.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/20/2011--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to personal holding company rules, to repeal certain exceptions to the treatment of consolidated groups of corporations under such rules.
